name: Sea Foam
description:
"Agitation of seawater, particulary when it contains higher concentrations of dissolved organic matter."

Children of the Sea by Daisuke Igarashi is one of my favorite manga (please read it if you haven’t!) The art, the story, left me speechless, and when the OVA came out, I was so excited that I couldn’t help but to express my enthusiasm into an illustration. This is Sora in my interpretation.
